name: react-native-simple-animations
description: A React Native component that adds simple entrance, exit, and attention-seeking animations to a child component.

scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src --out-dir lib --env-name production --copy-files --source-maps && echo "\x1b[42m\x1b[1m BABEL \x1b[0m" Library built
scripts.clean: rm -rf lib/ && echo "\x1b[42m\x1b[1m CLEAN \x1b[0m" Cleaned library folder
scripts.copy-package-json: cp package.json lib/ && cp README.md lib/ && echo "\x1b[42m\x1b[1m COPY \x1b[0m" Copied package.json to library
scripts.eslint: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" No JavaScript ESLint errors to fix
scripts.eslint:fix: ./node_modules/.bin/eslint --fix src/ && echo "\x1b[102m\x1b[1m ESLINT \x1b[0m" ESLint JavaScript errors fixed
scripts.pre-publish: npm run --silent eslint:fix && npm run --silent test && npm run --silent clean && npm run --silent build && npm run --silent copy-package-json
